blogPost.excerpt: Don't keep your audience waiting for a follow-up email! Sharing slides or resources has never been easier. Upload your content, add your custom QR code to any presentation and streamline sharing. ****Currently free for all early access users****

previous.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!
